languages.text: {n}Торбальд лишь подносит палец к губам и улыбается.{/n}
{n}Instead of answering you, Thorbald merely brings a finger to his lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索巴德并没有回答你，只是将手指放在了嘴唇上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Instead of answering you, Thorbald merely brings a finger to his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德并没有回答你，只是将手指放在了嘴唇上。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}あなたの質問に答える代わりに、トールバルドはただ指を唇にあてる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Instead of answering you, Thorbald merely brings a finger to his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの質問に答える代わりに、トールバルドはただ指を唇にあてる。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Au lieu de vous répondre, Thorbald pose un doigt sur ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Instead of answering you, Thorbald merely brings a finger to his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au lieu de vous répondre, Thorbald pose un doigt sur ses lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anstatt dir zu antworten, legt Thorbald sich lediglich einen Finger auf die Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Instead of answering you, Thorbald merely brings a finger to his lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, sana cevap vermek yerine sadece parmağını dudaklarına götürüyor.{/n}
